main event: Several unusual lights were observed by USAF pilots near Tokyo, Japan on January 30, 1958.
interesting points: The lights were observed on three separate occasions, Flashes were described as yellow to yellow-orange, The observation lasted for about 15 minutes, Observers reported a total of 15 unusual lights during the sighting, There is a possibility that the lights may have been associated with missile firings.
witness description: Maj. Herbert M. Carr (Intelligence), Lt. Clayton F. Gray (Operations), and J.G. Gammage (Senior Pilot)
